title: How to calculate professional tax - Quora

response.answer_text: It all depends on the following: Which state/jurisdiction you are looking for.Are you deducting and paying on behalf of your employee or are you paying for yourself?Based on these, one may determine the Professional Tax payable. Apart from this, you may also have to look into other aspects like exemptions available. To make your life easy, kindly contact a Chartered Accountant near you who will be the best person to help you in this regard.
